title: Take advantage of our new special! $500 security deposit!
posting_body: Choose this comfortable studio model at Thornbridge for a relaxing home in a perfect south San Jose location near the 101 and Highway 85.
Inside, you’ll find features designed with you in mind, including an oversized walk-in closet and a bathroom with a soaking tub.
The living room pairs the comfort of air conditioning and heating with the stylish finish of updated flooring, available in select homes.
In the kitchen, updated appliances and cabinets, together with a breakfast bar add more function as well.
After preparing a home-cooked meal, serve it alfresco on the private patio or deck.
Around Thornbridge, you can enjoy refreshing dips in the pool or time soaking up the California sunshine on the poolside sundeck.
Speed up your laundry day routine courtesy of the five on-site clothes care facilities, and take advantage of the ample on-site parking for your convenience.
Reach out to a member of the leasing team for updates today!
*$500 security deposit special is based on approved credit*
* Minutes Away from Downtown San Jose
* Easy Access to Dining, Entertainment, Freeways and Shopping
* Affordable Community with Wait List Policy
* Resident Services - Enjoy free groceries twice per month through our mobile food pantry
1 assigned covered space -- additional parking is first come first serve.
